name: Curieuse Mangroves: Root Letters
description:
4 crab mounds, 5 arches, 1 tortoise bell. Roots form the letter I.

Riddle: "To read the forest, climb one branch higher."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 4 crab mounds, 5 arches, 1 tortoise bell. Roots form the letter I.. mangrove_root_cathedral_letter_formation with twisted_root_mud_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_mangrove_maze_midground_arches_foreground_bell. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: crab_mound_patterns, tortoise_shell_bell. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: 4 crab mounds, 5 arches, 1 tortoise bell. Roots form the letter I.
puzzle_data.riddle: To read the forest, climb one branch higher.
